name: International Confe9th International Conference on Research in Behavioral and Social Sciencesrence on Social Sciences, Humanities and Arts
content: Vienna, Austria will be the host of the 9th edition of the International Conference on Research in Behavioral and Social Sciences – ICRBS 2022\. This social sciences conference is a must-attend event for scientists, researchers, scholars, and other members of academia working in the field of behavioral and social sciences. The agenda will feature cutting-edge presentations from leading academics around the world. Are you one of them? Submit your paper! If selected, you will get a chance to present it – in-person or virtually – at one of the most respected social sciences conferences in the world, plus get published in indexed international academic journals.
